item.title: 数据调整后尼日利亚通胀放缓，利率前景不明朗
item.description: 尼日利亚统计局修订了用于计算家庭支出的数据后，1 月份的年通货膨胀率有所下降，这给利率前景蒙上了阴影。【原文：Nigeria’s annual inflation rate fell in January after the statistics office revised the data used to calculate household expenditure, clouding the interest-rate outlook.】

item.title: Robinhood 预计 2025 年在新加坡推出加密货币产品
item.description: Robinhood Markets 公司计划在 2025 年通过其最近收购的欧洲数字资产交易所 Bitstamp Ltd. 的一个实体推出新加坡加密货币产品。【原文：Robinhood Markets Inc. plans to launch Singapore crypto offerings in 2025 through an entity of European digital-assets exchange Bitstamp Ltd., which it recently acquired.】

item.title: 美国银行调查显示，投资者的风险偏好为 15 年来最高
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的一项调查显示，全球股市已成为最受投资者欢迎的资产类别，投资者承担风险的意愿是 15 年来最高的。【原文：Global stocks have become the most popular asset class with investors, who are showing the biggest willingness to take risk in 15 years, according to a survey by Bank of America Corp.】

item.title: 泰晤士河水务公司的救援贷款获得伦敦法官批准
item.description: 伦敦一名法官批准了泰晤士河水务公司（Thames Water）的一笔关键性救援贷款，使该公司在继续与贷款方谈判重组的同时获得了一些急需的喘息空间。【原文：A London judge approved a crucial rescue loan for Thames Water, giving the utility some much needed breathing room while it continues to negotiate a restructuring with its lenders.】

item.title: 新加坡 25 财年预算盈余 68 亿新元
item.description: 新加坡总理黄遵宪在周二向国会发表的预算演讲中表示，新加坡预计 2025 财年的预算盈余将达到 68 亿新元。【原文：Singapore expects a budget surplus of S$6.8 billion for FY2025, Prime Minister Lawrence Wong says in his budget speech to parliament on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国人工智能竞争白热化，百度收入下滑
item.description: 百度公司（Baidu Inc.【原文：Baidu Inc. reported a smaller-than-expected revenue drop, alleviating concerns its internet search and artificial intelligence businesses are buckling under fierce competition.】

item.title: 新世界建议增加 38 亿美元贷款抵押品
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，香港开发商新世界发展有限公司（New World Development Co.【原文：Hong Kong developer New World Development Co. has proposed using $3.8 billion of additional properties as collateral to refinance bank loans maturing in 2027 and beyond, according to people familiar with the matter, as it looks to ease liquidity pressure.】

item.title: 新加坡官员称仅购买少量英伟达芯片
item.description: 据一位高级官员称，新加坡只占英伟达公司收入的很小一部分，因为华盛顿正在调查中国人工智能初创公司 DeepSeek 是否通过这个东南亚国家获得芯片。【原文：Singapore accounts for only a very modest portion of Nvidia Corp.’s revenue, according to a senior official, as Washington is looking into whether Chinese AI startup DeepSeek has been securing chips via the Southeast Asian country.】

item.title: 新加坡在预算案中提出从芯片到能源的投资计划
item.description: 新加坡总理黄遵宪表示，新加坡计划投资约 10 亿新元（约合 7.448 亿美元）建设新的半导体研发设施，为研究人员和行业合作伙伴提供 "强大的工具"，以促进创新。【原文：Singapore plans to invest about S$1 billion ($744.8 million) for a new R&D semiconductor facility that will provide “great tools for researchers and industry partners” to boost innovation, according to Prime Minister Lawrence Wong.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦力争在不增加纳税人负担的情况下实现国际货币基金组织的目标
item.description: 巴基斯坦财政部长表示，巴基斯坦将能够实现今年的财政收入目标，同时不会进一步增加现有纳税人的负担，而此时政府正寻求遏制自去年以来因不受欢迎的改革（包括创纪录的高税收）而面临的批评。【原文：Pakistan’s finance minister said the country will be able to meet its revenue goals for the year, without adding further strain on existing taxpayers, at a time the government looks to curb the criticism it has faced since last year over unpopular reforms, including record-high taxes.】

item.title: Citadel 亚洲基本面股票部门副主管离职
item.description: Citadel 亚洲基本面股票部门副主管 Takeo Serizawa 在该投资公司任职约 21 个月后离职。【原文：Citadel’s deputy head of Asia fundamental equities Takeo Serizawa left the company after about 21 months at the investment firm.】

item.title: 澳大利亚对美国的收益率贴水因澳大利亚央行前景而消失
item.description: 在周二央行鹰派降息促使投资者重新思考澳大利亚货币政策前景之后，澳大利亚债券收益率相对于美国国债的贴水已接近消失。【原文：Australia’s bond yield discount versus US Treasuries is close to vanishing after Tuesday’s hawkish central bank interest-rate cut prompted investors to rethink the outlook for the nation’s monetary policy.】

item.title: 黄教安准备大选，新加坡誓言派发更多现金
item.description: 新加坡总理黄遵宪在去年上任后的首次预算报告中表示，新加坡政府将增加对家庭的一些支付和回扣，以支付选民最关心的生活费用。【原文：Singapore’s government will boost some payments and rebates to households to defray living costs that remain top of mind for voters, Prime Minister Lawrence Wong said in his first budget presentation since taking office last year.】

item.title: 能源巨头埃尼集团推进出售计划，KKR增持Enilive股份
item.description: KKR & Co.正在将其在埃尼集团（Eni SpA）旗下 Enilive 公司的持股比例提高到 30%，因为这家意大利能源巨头正在推进其到 2027 年出售 80 亿欧元（84 亿美元）资产的计划。【原文：KKR & Co. is raising its stake in Eni SpA’s Enilive to 30%, as the Italian energy major pushes ahead with its plan to sell €8 billion ($8.4 billion) in assets through 2027.】

item.title: 货币升值帮助肯尼亚二十年来首次削减债务
item.description: 肯尼亚的公共债务总额在至少二十年来首次下降，因为其世界性的货币帮助这个东非国家降低了对外债务。【原文：Kenya’s gross public debt fell for the first time in at least two decades as its world-beating currency helped the East African nation lower its external obligations.】

item.title: 中东航空公司将重振飞机购买热潮
item.description: 中东地区一些最大的航空公司在去年大量订购飞机之后，现在正准备补充机队，数百架计划采购的飞机将巩固该地区作为波音公司和空中客车公司主要增长动力的地位。【原文：After largely sitting out last year’s flurry of aircraft orders, some of the biggest airlines in the Middle East are now preparing to replenish their fleets, with hundreds of planned purchases set to cement the region as key growth driver for Boeing Co. and Airbus SE.】

item.title: 黄金市场萧条刺激新加坡对美出口激增
item.description: 1 月份，从新加坡运往美国的黄金攀升至近三年来的最高水平，这进一步表明，在主要市场出现定价差异后，金银交易出现了混乱。【原文：Gold shipments from Singapore to the US climbed to the highest level in almost three years in January, a further sign of the ructions in bullion trading after pricing disparities opened up in key markets.】

item.title: 中国私人泊位成为俄罗斯和伊朗石油的热点地区
item.description: 中国的私营码头已经接受了美国制裁的油轮的交货，这表明中国这个伊朗和俄罗斯原油的最大买家所在的地区正在想方设法规避大型港口运营商的不情愿。【原文：Privately-run terminals in China have taken deliveries from US-sanctioned oil tankers, suggesting that a region that is home to the country’s largest buyers of Iranian and Russian crude is finding ways to circumvent the reluctance of larger port operators.】

item.title: 南非准备为国家工作人员制定提前退休计划
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，南非政府已经起草了一份公务员提前退休方案，作为削减工资支出努力的一部分。【原文：South Africa’s government has drafted an early retirement offer for civil servants, part of an effort to reduce its wage bill, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英国薪资增长和就业率上升，无视劳动税上调
item.description: 英国的薪资增速回升至八个月来的最高水平，就业率也意外上升，就业市场似乎对工党政府即将增加的260亿英镑（328亿美元）工资税有一定的承受力。【原文：UK pay growth picked up to its highest level in eight months and employment unexpectedly rose, as the jobs market appeared resilient to the Labour government’s upcoming £26 billion ($32.8 billion) increase in payroll taxes.】

item.title: 新加坡总理黄教安将首次发布年度财政预算案
item.description: 2 月 17 日，新加坡。摄影师：Nicky Loh/Bloomberg【原文：Singapore on Feb. 17. Photographer: Nicky Loh/Bloomberg】

item.title: 亿万富翁米塔尔的公司出售价值 9.76 亿美元的 Airtel 股份
item.description: 亿万富翁、创始人苏尼尔-巴蒂-米塔尔（Sunil Bharti Mittal）拥有的一家公司出售了印度第二大无线运营商价值 9.76 亿美元的股票，这位第一代企业家正在寻求资金以寻找新的机会。【原文：A unit owned by billionaire-founder Sunil Bharti Mittal sold shares worth $976 million in India’s No.2 wireless carrier, as the first-generation entrepreneur seeks funds for newer opportunities.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国就业和工资数据公布前英镑走软
对冲基金助推迪拜金融区实现创纪录增长
item.description: 去年，迪拜金融区的公司注册数量创纪录地增长了 25%，部分原因是对冲基金的持续涌入，使迪拜成为该行业的新兴中心。【原文：Dubai’s financial district reported a record 25% increase in company registrations last year, helped in part to by a continuing influx of hedge funds that’s transformed the city into an emerging hub for the sector.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行认为即使在最糟糕的情况下美国关税对经济的打击也不大
item.description: 周二发布的一份分析报告称，即使美国对华关税的增幅比储备银行的中心方案高出40个百分点，澳大利亚经济也只会受到有限的冲击。【原文：Australia’s economy will take only a limited hit from US tariffs on China even if they are increased by 40 percentage points more than the Reserve Bank’s central scenario, according to an analysis released Tuesday.】

item.title: 新加坡激进投资者 3D 质疑札幌收购案
item.description: 新加坡投资基金 3D Investment Partners Pte 于 2 月 18 日致函札幌控股有限公司，批评其过去的海外收购是失败的，并质疑董事会的责任。【原文：Singapore-based investment fund 3D Investment Partners Pte sent a letter dated Feb. 18 criticizing Sapporo Holdings Ltd.’s past overseas acquisitions as failures, and questioning the responsibility of the board of directors.】

item.title: 芮效俭称韩国央行处于宽松周期，下周将研究杂项因素
item.description: 韩国央行行长李昌镛（Rhee Chang-yong）周二表示，韩国央行仍处于宽松周期，当局将在下周确定利率时审查包括货币和经济势头在内的各种因素。【原文：The Bank of Korea remains in an easing cycle and authorities will review a variety of factors including the currency and economic momentum when they set interest rates next week, Governor Rhee Chang-yong said Tuesday.】

item.title: 亿万富翁弗里德兰的铁矿公司在澳大利亚首次公开募股中寻求高达 1.9 亿美元的资金
item.description: 矿业亿万富翁罗伯特-弗里德兰（Robert Friedland）的最新企业--铁矿石生产商艾芬豪大西洋公司（Ivanhoe Atlantic Inc.【原文：Mining billionaire Robert Friedland’s latest venture, iron ore producer Ivanhoe Atlantic Inc., is seeking to raise as much as A$300 million ($190 million) from an initial public offering in Australia, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 卢比贬值冲击印度，珠宝商与米厂讨论套期保值问题
item.description: 印度公司应对卢比下跌的策略是财报电话会议上讨论最多的话题之一，分析师们希望印度公司明确未来收入的对冲计划。【原文：Indian companies’ strategy to counter the falling rupee was among the most discussed topics on earnings calls, with analysts seeking clarity on plans to hedge future revenues.】

item.title: 前日本央行副总裁中佐认为日本央行将加息至 1%，甚至更高
item.description: 日本央行前副行长表示，日本央行目前将继续把基准利率上调至 1%，之后可能会根据经济状况寻找进一步加息的机会。【原文：The Bank of Japan is set to continue raising its benchmark interest rate toward 1% for now and will likely look for further rate hike opportunities afterwards depending on economic conditions, according to a former deputy governor of the central bank.】
